solution_line_template: He drinks {water_per_week} ounces of water per week because {water_per_day} x {days_per_week} = <<{water_per_day}*{days_per_week}={water_per_week}>>{water_per_week}
He will need to fill it {fills_per_week} times because {water_per_week} / {bottle_capacity} = <<{water_per_week}/{bottle_capacity}={fills_per_week}>>{fills_per_week}
